definition: to jeopardize/to harm/to endanger/harmful effect/damage/CL:個|个[ge4]
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: Use of expired drugs can be dangerous for patients' health.
sentences.chinese: 使用過期藥物可能對病人的健康造成危害。

sentences.english: The Eimeria species, causative agents of the disease coccidiosis, are genetically complex protozoan parasites endemic in poultry.
sentences.chinese: 雞球蟲病是嚴重危害養禽業的一種寄生蟲病。

sentences.english: It is discussed the occurrence and harmfulness of valsa sordida of poplar in 4 aspects.
sentences.chinese: 從4個方面論述了楊樹爛皮病的發生規律及危害性。

sentences.english: Cucumber downy mildew is a rather serious plant disease damage in every place of world.
sentences.chinese: 黃瓜霜黴病是對黃瓜生長髮育危害最大的世界性病害。

sentences.english: Phaeodactylum tricornutum is one of the harmful red tide algae.
sentences.chinese: 三角褐指藻是極具危害的赤潮藻之一。

sentences.english: Cassava brown streak disease is a more destructive form of cassava mosaic.
sentences.chinese: 木薯褐條病是木薯花葉病中危害性較大的一種病。

sentences.english: Gefitinib may harm the fetus and increase the risk of pregnancy loss.
sentences.chinese: 吉非替尼可能危害胎兒及提高流產的風險。

sentences.english: "the black screen" to the computer user's harm, overestimates greatly.
sentences.chinese: “黑屏”對電腦用戶的危害，被大大地高估了。

sentences.english: At the same time, the studies are more clearly defining screening’s harms.
sentences.chinese: 於此同時，這項研究清楚地顯示了癌症篩檢的危害。

sentences.english: This characteristics are favorable to resist the dry-hot weather during milk-filling of wheat.
sentences.chinese: 這一特徵有利於抗禦小麥灌漿期乾熱天氣的危害。

sentences.english: In order to keep the in-phase of the lines, it designs the phase detection circuit.
sentences.chinese: 針對非同步投入帶來的危害，設計了相位檢測電路。

sentences.english: FLATOW: And what kind of damage do these stink bugs do?
The distortion psychology of viewpoint on hardship and happiness is to refuse to take on the moral obligation to endanger society.
sentences.chinese: 苦樂觀的扭曲心理是拒絕承擔道德責任而危害社會。

sentences.english: The heart disease and stroke are the frequently disease harming the mankind healthiness .
sentences.chinese: 心腦血管疾病是危害人類健康的常見疾病。

sentences.english: Soybean cyst nematode is one of the most serious diseases in the world soybean areas.
sentences.chinese: 大豆胞囊線蟲病是世界大豆產區危害最重的病害之一。

sentences.english: The biological invasion has got great attention from all over the world because of its huge harm.
sentences.chinese: 生物入侵因其巨大的危害性成爲全球關注的熱點問題。

definition: a danger concealed within sth/hidden damage/misfortune not visible from the surface
to endanger/to jeopardize/a danger (to life, national security etc)
to prevent/to take precautions against/to protect/to guard against/precautionary/prophylactic
